      • processUserInput

        public void processUserInput(Square newSelection)
        Description copied from interface: Games
        Handel's how the game should react on a valid action on the Canvas. The Game will either set a new Square as currently selected, reset the selection or will execute a valid move.
        Parameters:
        newSelection - The Square that was clicked on by tge user
